projects.title: Fintrack
projects.description2: An Expense Tracker was developed using Firebase Realtime Database. CRUD operations were implemented using Axios, while form validation was achieved through Formik and Yup. The project also utilized Context API, navigation features, and CRUD operations. Firebase was chosen as the backend for one instance of the project, while the other instance used a Node.js backend with MongoDB as the database. Additionally, a third-party UI library, React Native Paper, was employed.

projects.title: Facebook messenger Clone
projects.description2: Facebook Messenger Clone app, a showcase of my skills in frontend and backend development. Built using cutting-edge technologies, this app mimics the familiar chat interface of Facebook Messenger. From real-time messaging to user authentication, I've implemented features that demonstrate my proficiency in creating interactive and secure applications.

projects.title: Vidly Backend
projects.description2: Made a clone of vidly backend site. Developed and maintained the backend infrastructure of the Vidly movie site, including databases, search algorithms, and efficient content management across a diverse array of genres such as action, comedy, drama, horror, romance, and more,route handling, middleware, and error handling in Express.

aboutpara: I am a skilled MERN Stack and iOS/Android applications developer with extensive experience in utilizing cutting-edge technologies, including Next.js, React Native, React, Node.js, MongoDB, Firebase, MySQL, Git/GitHub, Soctek.io, three.js, chart.js, pusher,stream chat, auth0, passport.js, JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3. My passion drives me to approach every task with enthusiasm, perceiving each challenge as an opportunity for growth and innovation. I possess a deep commitment to excellence, continuously seeking ways to enhance my skills and stay abreast of the latest industry advancements. I look forward to collaborating with you and delivering exceptional results.
